dist.hmm

Class HiddenMarkovModelReestimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • dist.hmm.HiddenMarkovModelReestimator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Trainer

    public class HiddenMarkovModelReestimator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Trainer
    An implementation of the baum welch re estimation algorithm. Takes in a hidden markov model and set of observation sequences, then re estimates the parameters of the hidden markov model based on expected values calculated through the use of forward backward calculator
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
